description:
Rab's classic all-mountain waterproof shell jacket has been updated. Built from recycled GORE-TEX® fabric with a GORE C-KNIT™ backer, the Ladakh GTX Jacket brings you a softer, quieter, more comfortable ascent without compromising on protection.

The new Ladakh GTX Jacket is designed for all-day comfort on mountain ascents, showery scrambles and winter hillwalks. Its three-layer GORE-TEX® fabric with C-KNIT™ backer offers reduced weight, increased breathability and a smooth, soft-touch texture for next-to-skin comfort. The two-way, deep-venting pit zips help improve moisture management and the new jacket also features an advanced, helmet-compatible mountain hood with an integrated wind collar, a laminated peak and windproof three-way adjustment. In addition to a secure internal zipped pocket, quick-stash storage comes from a zipped chest pocket with internal securing clip and a pair of harness-compatible YKK® AquaGuard® zipped hand pockets.

Durable, waterproof and windproof, the Ladakh GTX Jacket is a soft and lightweight fast-wicking shell with excellent breathability and unrestricted movement for the broadest possible cross-section of active mountain sports.
name: Rab Ladakh GTX Jacket - Mens
